DataElement.preferredDefinition: The unique identification name of the source from where a sample is derived.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it; the activities undertaken during a study._A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis._The procedure of having an identity established.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A detailed critical inspection; a research project.

Concepts.definition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.

Property.preferredDefinition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:The procedure of having an identity established.

The procedure of having an identity established.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The unique identification name of the source from which a sample is derived.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
